title.rendered: Sharma Taylor in Conversation with Alexia Tolas

excerpt.rendered: Listen to the conversation between Sharma Taylor and Alexia Tolas, both shortlisted for the 2022 Commonwealth Short Story Prize, to mark the launch of Sharma’s debut novel, ‘What a Mother’s Love Don’t Teach You’, published by Virago.
